flavorText: When a god's will is against you, the day never ends well.

foreignData.flavorText: Wenn du den Willen eines Gottes gegen dich hast, endet der Tag niemals gut.
foreignData.name: Geraubte Hoffnung
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {1} bezahlt. Hellsicht 1. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst diese Karte unter deine Bibliothek legen.)

foreignData.flavorText: Cuando la voluntad de un dios está en tu contra, el día nunca acaba bien.
foreignData.name: Esperanzas truncadas
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {1}. Adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quand la volonté d'un dieu s'oppose à vous, la journée ne peut que mal finir.
foreignData.name: Espoirs contrariés
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {1}. Regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez mettre cette carte au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quando la volontà di un dio è contro di te, la giornata non finisce mai nel migliore dei modi.
foreignData.name: Speranze Ostacolate
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {1}. Profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)

foreignData.flavorText: 神の意志があなたに不利に働いていた場合、その日が平穏無事に終わることは無い。
foreignData.name: 阻まれた希望
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とする。そのコントローラーが{1}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: 신의 뜻을 거스르면 영 좋지 않은 꼴을 당한다.
foreignData.name: 좌절된 희망
foreignData.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문의 조종자가 {1}을 지불하지 않으면 그 주문을 무효화한다. 점술 1. (당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Quando a vontade de um deus está contra você, o dia nunca acaba bem.
foreignData.name: Esperanças Frustradas
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo, a menos que seu controlador pague {1}. Vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)

foreignData.flavorText: Если тебе противостоит божественная воля, вряд ли день будет удачным.
foreignData.name: Разрушенные Надежды
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, если только контролирующий его игрок не заплатит {1}. Предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)

foreignData.flavorText: 当神下定决心要让你好看时，这一日就绝不会善终。
foreignData.name: 希望破灭
foreignData.text: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{1}，否则反击之。占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

foreignData.flavorText: 當神下定決心要讓你好看時，這一日就絕不會善終。
foreignData.name: 希望破滅
foreignData.text: 除非目標咒語的操控者支付{1}，否則反擊之。占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）

name: Stymied Hopes
originalText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

rulings.text: If Stymied Hopes resolves, you’ll scry whether the controller of the target spell pays {1} or not.

When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
